value.title: Create and test color palettes for your data project quickly and easily!
value.excerpt: DataViz palette allows you to quickly see what your color palette would like on an actual graph. No longer spend ages on your color choices only to realize that they don't quite hit the mark once you've plugged in your data.  Experiment with different colors by importing palettes from your favourite

value.title: DAX Fridays! #77: GROUPBY, CURRENTGROUP
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays, we will go through the DAX function GROUPBY with an example.  GROUPBY is similar as SUMMARIZE, but the difference is that in the expression part, you use DAX iterators to get your results. You can also nest GROUPBY functions to get for example the highest sales amount by country.

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
